facebook.title: London Bridge attack: why the terror threat level was downgraded
facebook.summary: The scale of a terror threat is "unparalleled". Since 2013, MI5 has disrupted a total of 18 plots, including five since March 2017. The downgrading of the terror threat level can therefore tell us one thing about the London Bridge attack.
